action.content:
Things are in different places, but the questioner does not know about it yet. Here is the situation:

WHAT: Things at places
LEFT: cherry
RIGHT: lip gloss
TOP: tulip
BOTTOM: elephant
CENTER: harps
NORTHWEST: accordion
NORTHEAST: banjo
SOUTHWEST: evening gown
SOUTHEAST: bronzer
HERE: tiger
THERE: spider
NOWHERE: buttercup
EVERYWHERE: jackfruit
INSIDE: iodine
OUTSIDE: toolbelt

Questions from the questioner will start with QUESTIONER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <one sentence>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <one sentence>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
ME:  Does the questioner know what is on your left? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for LEFT valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Does the questioner know what is on your right? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Does the questioner know what is on your right? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Please follow my instructions. Does the questioner know what is on your right? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Please be specific now. Does the questioner know what is on your right? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Please think about it carefully. Does the questioner know what is on your right? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for RIGHT invalid after max attempts.
